hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bear Transition via Regulatory News Shock Absorption
hypothesis_content.statement: When major regulatory news (UK FCA/MiCA implementation) triggers >5% BTC drop during NEUTRAL regime, and price fails to recover 61.8% Fibonacci retracement within 72 hours while volume declines, regime transitions to BEAR with >60% probability, offering downside momentum opportunities.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes lack strong directional bias, making them vulnerable to negative catalysts. Failed recovery at key Fib level with weak volume indicates institutional selling absorption, shifting market structure.
entry_conditions: Regulatory headline triggers BTC -5% to -12% move
Price fails to reclaim 61.8% Fib of drop within 72 hours
Volume on recovery attempts < 90% of drop volume
Cumulative Volume Delta turns negative on rallies

exit_conditions.take_profit: Regime transitions to BEAR OR BTC drops additional -8% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC reclaims >61.8% Fib with volume >110% of drop volume

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Regulatory shocks in NEUTRAL regimes lead to V-shaped recoveries >50% of time OR fail to trigger BEAR transition within 5 days.
